title: (x) "Charlotte Olsson" modern sans - Stainless (Alexey, Yves}
content:
Can anyone help me ID this modern sans?

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/fonttest.jpg)
author: henand

comments.content: Basically [Dispatch](http://web.archive.org/web/20060503185443/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FB.106472.0.0) with the serifs chopped off. Keep that in mind if you need to match it with a serif face. ;^)
